reviewText: Good old fashioned adventure - Disney style! Can't go wrong with these Disney classics. Nothing comes close today.
Fun to watch Great classic to watch over and over. Grandchildren love it. Would make a great gift or stocking stuffer.

The Castaways was an OK movie, at least it played well enough.  But we couldn't even watch all of T.I.  because of problems with the DVD.  I would have returned it, but had already given it to my grandson.  I did receive it promptly.
My kids love In search of the Castaways.  Treasure island was an added bonus.  Great family movies if you like classic Disney!
These are favorite movies from childhood. Just want our Grandchildren to be able to watch. You can't go wrong with a Disney movie.

... good story/adventures & special f/x. some adventures: cool "earthquake slide away", w/ lg. bird, tidal wave, waterspout-2nd best scene on this list next to the earthquake scene. not reviewing treasureisland-wasn that interested, so far.
Good old time movies with lots of adventure and plenty of good memories from childhood. Who can't like the good/bad pirates?  Classic disney fun.

Two of Disney's excellent live action adventures are nicely packaged together in this affordable 2-disc set. They are both in the full-screen mode. This works fine for the 1950 "Treasure Island". A great version of the Robert Louis Stevenson story starring Robert Newton. Now the bad news: Jules Verne's "In Search Of The Castaways" is shown here in full-screen and suffers for the treatment. This would have been much improved if shown in a widescreen version. Shame that Disney doesn't give this entertaining movie with Hayley Mills a proper release. Cmon, Disney! Get with the program.
These are good movies that I still 'treasure'.  I got good service and I'm pleased.
Great childhood favorites
Two good movies at a great price.
Enjoyed the movies.
great and even loved treasure island, never seen that one before, love it and will buy one for my friend for christmas
Very pleased with purchase.

love this movie - Treasure Island
two films in one dvd was great and a great price...thanks...
great disney.
Purchased this and several other older movies for my grandkids
Had an issue with one of the movies -they gave really good customer svc.

Incredible adventures made entertaining by great actors. In treasure Island, it is the old story of Jim and the pirate looking for treasure. The bond they form with each other throws a kink into the plans of the pirate. Jim isn't the usual victim of his pirating. Jim shows he has integrity while at the same time a loyalty to friends. Great movie. In Search of the Castaways takes a group comprised the children of a missing sea captain, the owner of the ship company, the son of the owner, and a school teacher who finds a note in a bottle, on a series of journeys and adventures that are dangerous and beautiful. Incredible scenes with fire and flood and volcanoes keep up the action is this great  movie.
Classic Disney adventure! My kids love it :)
Thanks!!
Two of my favorite live action Disney films from my youth.
Great movies...I'm looking forward to sharing them with my daughter.
